agents.name: MultiOn
agents.shortDescription: AI agents that autonomously perform web-based tasks on your behalf
agents.longDescription: MultiOn is a technology platform that creates AI agents capable of interpreting user needs and completing complex tasks online from start to finish. These agents can navigate websites, interact with services, and execute various workflows based on simple user inputs. MultiOn aims to free up human time by delegating tedious and complex online interactions to AI, allowing people to focus on more fulfilling activities
keyFeatures: Secure remote sessions with native proxy support,
Chrome browser extension for local agent interaction,
Advanced full-page structured LLM data scraping,
useCases: Planning and booking gatherings,
Ordering food through delivery services,
Booking flights and travel arrangements,
Negotiating and purchasing vehicles,
Completing complex online transactions
agents.tags: AI agents, web automation, task delegation, natural language processing, autonomous systems

agents.name: Agent E
agents.shortDescription: State-of-the-art web agent automating tasks on your local browser
agents.longDescription: Agent-E is a state-of-the-art autonomous web navigation agent developed by Emergence AI that runs locally on your computer and can automate tasks using your own browser. It uses a multi-agent hierarchical architecture comprising of a Planner agent and an Executor Agent. Agent-E beats other published web agents by up to 30% in task success on the WebVoyager benchmark. It can plan, execute, adapt and learn making it a highly effective web navigation agent.
useCases: Your personal research assistant and secretary,
Scrape information from internet,
Automatically fill repetitive forms,
Automate any web tasks,
agents.tags: Web Agent, Multi-step reasoning, Multi-Agent, Automation, Workflow Automation

agents.name: Harpa AI
agents.shortDescription: AI-powered browser extension for automation and productivity tasks.
agents.longDescription: Harpa AI is a productivity tool designed as a browser extension that enhances web browsing by automating routine tasks and providing intelligent assistance. It integrates with various AI models like GPT and Claude to offer features such as summarizing web pages, extracting data, and monitoring changes on websites. This tool is particularly useful for users who want to streamline their online activities, improve efficiency, and access AI capabilities directly within their browser.
keyFeatures: PAGE-AWARE AI CHAT, AUTOMATED DATA EXTRACTION, WEB MONITORING, CONTENT SUMMARIZATION, CUSTOMIZABLE AUTOMATION COMMANDS, SEO KEYWORD ANALYSIS, EMAIL AND NOTIFICATION ALERTS
useCases: BROWSER AUTOMATION, PRODUCTIVITY ENHANCEMENT, DATA EXTRACTION, CONTENT CREATION, SEO OPTIMIZATION

agents.name: Starizon AI
agents.shortDescription: AI Agent and Browser Assistant for Efficient Browsing & Automation
agents.longDescription:
AI Agent and Browser Assistant for Efficient Browsing & Automation

Starizon AI is an AI-powered agent and browser assistant designed for automated web monitoring. It helps you read and engage with any webpage, offering AI chat, summaries, smart data extraction, and intelligent tracking of web content.
agents.tags: AI Assistant, AI Web Scraping, AI Web Monitoring, AI Summarization

agents.name: Runner H
agents.shortDescription: Automate complex web tasks with adaptable AI agents.
agents.longDescription: Runner H is an AI-powered web automation agent developed by HCompanyAI, designed to simplify and scale complex workflows. It features self-healing automation that adapts to changes in web interfaces without manual intervention, making it ideal for industries like e-commerce and finance. This tool allows developers and businesses to automate repetitive tasks efficiently, freeing up time for more strategic work.
keyFeatures: Natural Language Automation: Create workflows using simple commands.
Self-Healing Automation: Automatically adjusts to changes in web interfaces.
Cost-Effective AI: Utilizes compact models for efficient performance.
Scalable Design: Suitable for various industries such as e-commerce and finance.
Integration Capabilities: Works seamlessly with multi-system and legacy solutions.
useCases: E-commerce Automation: Handles tasks like product discovery and inventory tracking by adapting to UI changes.
Quality Assurance: Automates web testing processes, reducing maintenance and improving reliability.
Recruitment Automation: Streamlines hiring processes with single-prompt automation.
Financial Services: Facilitates onboarding processes by automating multi-step verification and compliance checks.

agents.name: WebVoyager
agents.shortDescription: End-to-end web agent powered by large multimodal models for real-world task automation
agents.longDescription: WebVoyager is an innovative web agent that utilizes large multimodal models (LMM) to autonomously complete complex web tasks. It processes user instructions, observes screenshots and textual content, formulates actions, and executes them on real websites. WebVoyager outperforms existing solutions by handling multiple input modalities and interacting with actual web environments, making it highly effective for various real-world applications
keyFeatures: Self-healing automation adapting to UI changes
End-to-end task completion without human intervention
useCases: E-commerce automation (product discovery, inventory tracking)
Web research and information gathering
Form filling and data entry
Website testing and quality assurance
Complex web-based workflows in finance and other industries

agents.name: Cekura (YC F24)
agents.shortDescription: AI browser agent that automates documentation maintenance for SaaS companies
agents.longDescription: Cekura offers an AI-powered browser agent designed to verify and update documentation for SaaS companies. The agent can read how-to articles, navigate products, and check if the documentation is still valid. This automation helps knowledge and customer success teams save significant time and effort in maintaining up-to-date help articles and product documentation
useCases: Verifying help articles after product updates
Maintaining large knowledge bases for SaaS products
Reducing manual effort in documentation maintenance
Ensuring consistency between product features and documentation
Improving the accuracy of customer-facing help resources

agents.name: Project Mariner
agents.shortDescription: Web AI Agent that autonomously navigates and completes web tasks.
agents.longDescription: Project Mariner is an experimental AI agent developed by Google DeepMind, built on the Gemini 2.0 model. It operates as a Chrome extension, capable of understanding and interacting with web content, including text, images, and forms. The agent can autonomously navigate websites, execute searches, and complete tasks on behalf of the user, acting as a versatile digital assistant for web-based activities
keyFeatures: Autonomous web navigation and task completion
Multimodal data processing (text, images, audio, video)
Reasoning capabilities for complex task planning
Real-time logging of actions for user oversight
Ability to ask for clarification when needed
useCases: Automating research tasks (e.g., finding contact information for multiple companies)
Assisting with online shopping (creating shopping lists, finding products)
Booking travel arrangements (flights, hotels)
Finding and compiling information from multiple websites
Automating repetitive web-based tasks
Assisting with recipe searches and meal planning
